Address.label: Address
Address.value: 6900 LAYTON AVENUE,12TH FLOOR, DENVER, Colorado, 80237, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: ModivCare Inc is a technology-enabled healthcare services company, which provides a suite of integrated supportive care solutions for public and private payors and their patients. The company is also a provider of non-emergency medical transportation (NEMT), personal and home care, and nutritional meal delivery. Its operating segment includes NEMT, Personal Care, RPM, and Matrix Investment. The company generates maximum revenue from the NEMT segment.
